keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)

byline.original: By BRYAN DENTON and MICHAEL R. GORDON
byline.contributor: Kamil Kakol contributed reporting from Sheikh Amir, and Tim Arango and Falih Hassan from Erbil, Iraq.

lead_paragraph: Kurdish pesh merga forces started their push toward Islamic State-held villages slowly, by moonlight. Soon, the crawl became a run.

headline.print_headline: Advance Gets Underway Amid Traps, Smoke Screens and Suicide Bombers
headline.main: At the Mosul Front: Traps, Smoke Screens and Suicide Bombers

snippet: Kurdish pesh merga forces started their push toward Islamic State-held villages slowly, by moonlight. Soon, the crawl became a run....
abstract: Kurdish pesh merga forces, along with Iraqi security forces, allied militias and American air support, launch aggressive assault to reclaim city of Mosul, Iraq, from Islamic State.
